SELECT mz.nombre, mz.nombre_ps_zonal, mz.idzona, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mae_sector_minis_zonal msmz WHERE msmz.idzona = mz.idzona ) AS cant_sectores, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mae_supervision ms JOIN mae_sector_minis_zonal msmz ON ms.idsector_ministerio = msmz.idsector_ministerio WHERE msmz.idzona = mz.idzona) AS cant_supervisiones, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mae_celula mc JOIN mae_supervision ms ON mc.idsupervision = ms.idsupervision JOIN mae_sector_minis_zonal msmz ON ms.idsector_ministerio = msmz.idsector_ministerio WHERE msmz.idzona = mz.idzona) AS cant_celulas, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mae_cristiano c JOIN mae_celula mc ON c.idcelula = mc.idcelula JOIN mae_supervision ms ON mc.idsupervision = ms.idsupervision JOIN mae_sector_minis_zonal msmz ON ms.idsector_ministerio = msmz.idsector_ministerio WHERE membresia = 'M' and msmz.idzona = mz.idzona ) AS miembros, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mae_cristiano c JOIN mae_celula mc ON c.idcelula = mc.idcelula JOIN mae_supervision ms ON mc.idsupervision = ms.idsupervision JOIN mae_sector_minis_zonal msmz ON ms.idsector_ministerio = msmz.idsector_ministerio WHERE membresia = 'A' and msmz.idzona = mz.idzona ) AS asistentes, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mae_cristiano c JOIN mae_celula mc ON c.idcelula = mc.idcelula JOIN mae_supervision ms ON mc.idsupervision = ms.idsupervision JOIN mae_sector_minis_zonal msmz ON ms.idsector_ministerio = msmz.idsector_ministerio WHERE msmz.idzona = mz.idzona ) AS total FROM mae_zona mz ORDER BY mz.idzona DESC
